name: One Small Step
description:
Created for Ludem Dare 38.

--------------------------

Your species has finally reached the point where they are able to colonize other planets. Traverse your solar system in order to colonize other planets and ensure the survival of the glorious Empire!

Travel the solar system, terraform planets, colonize, and harvest the planet to move on to the next planet.

--------------------------

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Select

Right Mouse Button: Cancel

Mouse Wheel: Pan/Zoom
